name: 5 Minutes To Midnight (PowerfulBacon)
description:
5 minutes to midnight

BEST PLAYED WITH AN XBOX ONE CONTROLLER (But Playable with a keyboard and mouse)

Overview

5 minutes until the new year; the streets flooded with zombies; radioactive waste everywhere and a military ready to launch a counter-strike against the infected areas.

You reside in one of the recently overrun towns, armed with your trusty handgun and a flashlight. Venture through the streets and sewers to try and stop the innevitable nuclear blast, but don't hang around; word has it your final hour will be midnight tonight.

Gameplay

Run through the streets shooting the undead! The game features multiple weapons, all with different functionality. There are many different interactive components in the levels which make the gameplay experience mroe engaging, such as eplosive barrels and equippable weapons.

Controls

----|----
Left Analogue Stick | Movement
Right Analogue Stick | Aiming
Right Trigger | Shoot
A | Interact
X | Reload
